title: SOLD: T206 Ty Cobb Bat Off Shoulder, SGC 4
author: Kris19

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Ty Cobb Bat Off Shoulder, SGC 4
posts.post_content:
Very recently graded.  Nice centering, brilliant colors, and perfect registration.  Piedmont 350 Factory No. 25 back is very clean.

SOLD net to me, PayPal F/F preferred.  
Please PM or email [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url]
Happy to email larger photos, if desired.
 Thanks!
Bump for second price reduction.  Happy to email larger images upon request.
I've attempted numerous times to load a better/larger image of the card.  I give up.  It's a nice card.  I will drop the price to SOLD.

Does the price go back up with a larger scan?:D

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/junk/65411/cobb-bat-off[/IMG]
Thanks, Frank!  Not with it looking all blurry like that.  I'll keep the discount in place :)
